scripts.sea-full: npm run make-blob && npm run sea-win && npm run sea-lin && npm run sea-mac
scripts.make-rollup-blob: rollup client.js -o clientRollup.js && esbuild clientRollup.js --bundle --platform=node --outfile=./sea-build/built-client.js && node sea-config.json
scripts.sea-win: copy "M:\Nodejs Versions\22.2.0\NodeWin.exe" "M:\Workspaces\Code Vision Studio\FiskPay Donations\fiskpay_donation\l2_client\sea-build\Windows\L2FiskPay.exe" && npx postject ./sea-build/Windows/L2FiskPay.exe NODE_SEA_BLOB ./sea-build/client.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 --overwrite
scripts.sea-lin: copy "M:\Nodejs Versions\22.2.0\NodeLin" "M:\Workspaces\Code Vision Studio\FiskPay Donations\fiskpay_donation\l2_client\sea-build\Linux\L2FiskPay" && npx postject ./sea-build/Linux/L2FiskPay NODE_SEA_BLOB ./sea-build/client.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 --overwrite
scripts.sea-mac: copy "M:\Nodejs Versions\22.2.0\NodeMac" "M:\Workspaces\Code Vision Studio\FiskPay Donations\fiskpay_donation\l2_client\sea-build\MacOS\L2FiskPay" && npx postject ./sea-build/MacOS/L2FiskPay NODE_SEA_BLOB ./sea-build/client.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 --overwrite
